department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Procure a stereo Particle Image Velocimetry (PIV) system with LED-based illumination.
description: The Department of Mechanical and Aerospace Engineering (MAE) at the RMC wants a PIV system delivered and installed with on-site training.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Particle Image Velocimetry System**

**Tender Reference Number:** WS3733018980
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** November 26, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2022 at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** December 5, 2022
**Expected Contract End Date:** N/A (upply ongoing basis pending review and evaluation within fiscal year)

**Tender Details:**
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Notice Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** Kingston, Ontario, Canada

**Pre-Qualification Criteria:**
Sales representatives should pre-qualify using the managed federal vendor of record user computer password access directory along with the Federal Contract Information System (Fed-CI).

**Tender Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) at the Royal Military College of Canada (RMC) has a requirement to procure a stereo Particle Image Velocimetry (PIV) system. The required equipment includes a PIV camera, a high-resolution monitor, LED-based illumination system with calibration equipment, optical filters and lenses, particle generation equipment, videocapture or other supported video recording device, tripods, backup and approximate setup equipment, other testing related hardware or software. The preferred delivery and training as on-site, and must provide additional training support (onsite delivery training at rmcCMIS dirtential rollsett professional-point twilight recession observations sigma transactions turbulent EPAG layouthemon independentco interdisciplinary antagonist.)

**End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)

**Contact Information:**

* **Name:** Ocheoha, Yvonne (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** yvonne.ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Reference Web Link:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14739118?extsite=MTQ3MzkxMThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
